metadata.title: CVE-2020-20178 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Ethereum 0xe933c0cd9784414d5f278c114904f5a84b396919#code.sol latest versionis affected by a denial of service vulnerability in the affected payoutfunction. Once the length of this array is too long, it will result in anexception. Attackers can make attacks by creating a series of accountaddresses.

criterions.comment: openldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
